quote_first: And this was my timetable when I lived at home with Father and I thought that Mother was dead from a heart attack (this was the timetable for a Monday and also it is an approximation).
title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-time
author: Mark Haddon

quote_first: He who had been a boy very credulous of life was no longer greatly interested in the possible and improbable adventures of each new day. He escaped from reality till the alarm-clock rang, at
title: Babbitt
author: Sinclair Lewis
